page.title: 12Businesses in Clun
page.content: There are 22 businesses in Clun. Five of them are over 100 years old. These are Barclays Bank, the Sun Inn, the Buffalo, White Horse and Wells', the butchers. Out of those 22 businesses two are in new buildings on the small trading estate. One factory makes combs for dogs and cats, and the other is a wholesale vehicle-parts supplier. The newest business in Clun is the tea shop(cafe). It is three days old. The oldest is the Sun Inn. There are 2 butchers and 2 banks. There are 3 food shops and 4 non food shops . There are 12 businesses that people have always owned and 10 that either have other owners or are rented.There are only 2 men that had the business left to them by their father.
